name: Siren City
description:
Siren City is a single player driving game.

The player takes the role of a rookie cop in a patrol car. The object of the game is to drive around the city, avoiding other traffic which will try to crash into the patrol car, catching bad guys. There are three main bad guys to catch in this game, Slit-throat Steve, Dune Buggy Jon, and Dr J Davies the criminal mastermind.

shot.caption: The game's title screen. Left to its own devices the game will run a short demonstration
The game is running in demo mode. The patrol car is the black and white rectangle
Many of the other cars look like racing cars
Moving out into the suburbs. The scenery changes and a helicopter begins to follow the patrol car
A good bit of product placement on the signs, well they do say it pays to advertise
Demonstration over. It seems that the helcopter was not a police support unit but a bad guy
When starting the game the player can choose their assignment. The next prompt asks if the player wants to see the instructions for this assignment
These are the instructions for assignment 1
The game in progress. The assignment is just to drive around safely until the timer on the right runs out. Other cars & trucks will try and crash into the patrol car
The player has five lives / cars so when one is lost they game is not immediately over. When I lost a car it seems I still had five cars left for sme reason.
